Package gui.Notifications

Class Notifications

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.Notifications.Notifications
  • public class Notifications
extends java.lang.Object
    Notifications, this is a simple observer pattern. This class acts has the subject. (1) Handles sets and gets application events (2) registers observers (3) and notifies observers
    See Also:
    Observer, AppEvents
